title: Not receiving emails
content: Hi My Thunderbird email account has stopped receiving emails. I've just noticed no emails have come in in the last 6 days. I tried to send myself an email (from another account) which confirmed it wasn't working. I have unlimited storage so it's not a storage issue. Can you help me solve the problem? Thank you Anna
creator: annamado

title: Cannot log into my email account.
content: I used a cleanup program last night and it has wiped out my Thunderbird email account. I restored my computer to an earlier date, but program still won't open. I downloaded a new version of Thunderbird, but it will not let me log into email.
creator: magnummusicandmediaservices

title: Thunderbird Mobile OAuth login
content:
My alumni email account is hosted on Microsoft 360. My email address is xxx@alumni.caltech.edu, but the actual login user name is xxx@alumni.caltech.onmicrosoft.com. When I try to log in with Thunderbird for Android the user name is automatically set to my email address rather than the username specified in the incoming server settings. This field cannot be changed and it prevents me from logging in. Please help, and thank you for all of your fine work.

-->BoB
creator: robert.miorelli
